title: *Renovated North End Studio- Available ASAP. This will go QUICK!*
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 272391489', 'Rent: $1,775 / Month', 'Beds: 0', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 07/21/2022', 'Pet: Cats Allowed', 'Rent Includes:: Heat, Hot Water', 'Parking:: no parking', 'North End studio located on North Margin Street close to MGH, North Station, Downtown Boston, Financial District, shopping, dining, public transportation and much more.', 'Unit features: hardwood floors, newly updated kitchen and bath and laundry on site.', 'Heat & hot water included.', 'Call or email Jenna for more details', '978-504-1490', 'Transportation', 'Bus: 4, Causeway St @ Medford St (0.15 mi)', 'Bus: 93, N Washington St @ Medford St (0.10 mi)', 'Bus: 352, New Sudbury @', 'Congress St (0.25 mi)', 'Subway: Orange Line, Haymarket (0.20 mi)', 'Subway: Blue Line, Bowdoin (0.41 mi)', 'Ferry: Charlestown Ferry, Long Wharf (South) (0.53 mi)', 'Bus: 15, Cambridge St @ Saltonstall Bldg - Bowdoin Sq (0.41 mi)', 'Tram: D, Haymarket (0.20 mi)', 'Ferry:', 'Hingham/Hull Ferry, Long Wharf (North) (0.48 mi)', 'Bus: 117, Haymarket (0.19 mi)', 'Bus: 89/93, N Washington St @ Thacher St (0.09 mi)', 'Rail: Fitchburg Line, North Station (0.30 mi)', 'Jenna DeLuca of Benjamin Apartments & Cityside Homes', 'Real Estate Professional & Rental Manager', '978-504-1490', "Search Boston's largest selection of apartments at <URL>", 'Benjamin Apartments LLC makes a good faith effort to post accurate photographs and descriptions of the apartments listed for rent, but because the information is supplied by third parties and is not independently verified, we cannot always guarantee its accuracy.', 'Rental rates, listing information and availability are subject to error and change, and listed rates may be lower than actual rates due to incentives offered by landlords.', 'All apartments have a one month brokerage fee to be paid by renter unless otherwise noted.', 'Additionally, the apartment advertised may no longer be available for rent.', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC fully supports the principles of the Fair Housing Act and the Equal Opportunity Act.']
